details.description: Information and advice about what career choices are available for teenagers in England - National Careers Service
details.body:
Information and advice about what career choices are available for teenagers in England.

Careers helpline for teenagers

National Careers Service
Telephone: 0800 100 900
Text messages: 07766 413 219
Textphone: 0800 096 8336
Monday to Sunday, 8am to 10pm

tags.title: Apprenticeships,14 to 19 education and training at work

details.description: Includes finding a course, finding an apprenticeship, 16-19 Bursary Fund
Get help if you're at school, planning to go on to further or higher education, looking for training or interested in a student or career development loan.
Register your profile, search vacancies and apply for apprenticeships - you must be 16 or over
Professional and Career Development Loans are low interest loans to pay for courses and training that help with your career - eligibility, and repayments and interest
Student loans and student grants - finance, application forms, guides, student loan repayments
